org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas

Class AbstractReadCasVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas.AbstractCasFileVisitor
      • org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas.AbstractReadCasVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CasFileVisitor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAlignedReadCasVisitor

    public abstract class AbstractReadCasVisitor
extends AbstractCasFileVisitor
    A CasFileVisitor that handles iterating over the aligned reads in the cas file. Cas files don't actually store any read information, just pointers to where the input read files exist on the file system. This means that all the read alignments in the cas must be matched up exactly with the input read files. This can get very complicated so this class handles all of that for you.

    This abstract class finds all the read files to be parsed and maps them to the corresponding read in the input sequence file(s) so you can get the Trace for each read. For each read that aligned (matched), the aligned() method is called; for each non-aligned read, the notAligned() is called.

    Author:
    dkatzel
    Since:
    5.1

      • visitReadFileInfo

        public void visitReadFileInfo(CasFileInfo readFileInfo)
        Description copied from interface: CasFileVisitor
        Visit the CasFileInfo for a single read file or read mate pair. This method will be called n times where n is the sum of the number of fragment read input files and the number of mated pairs of read input files used in this .cas assembly.
        Specified by:
        visitReadFileInfo in interface CasFileVisitor

      • aligned

        protected abstract void aligned(Trace traceOfRead,
                                String referenceId,
                                CasMatch match)
        The given Trace aligned to the given reference id with the given CasMatch.
        Parameters:
        referenceId - the reference id that the read aligned to.
        match - the CasMatch of this read describing the alignment.
        traceOfRead - the complete Trace that aligned.

      • visitMatches

        public CasMatchVisitor visitMatches(CasFileVisitor.CasVisitorCallback callback)
        Description copied from class: AbstractCasFileVisitor
        Unless overridden, this method will return null to always skip the underlying matches. Visit each a match. This method will be called once for every read in ALL the input sequence files; even for reads that don't align!
        Specified by:
        visitMatches in interface CasFileVisitor
        Overrides:
        visitMatches in class AbstractCasFileVisitor
        Parameters:
        callback - the CasFileVisitor.CasVisitorCallback that can be used to halt parsing.
        Returns:
        a non-null CasMatchVisitor to actual visit this match; or null to skip this read.
